title: 'Avengers: Infinity War' opens big with $39 million in U.S., Canada
text:
April 27, 2018 / 3:38 PM / Updated 16 minutes ago 'Avengers: Infinity War' opens big with $39 million in U.S., Canada Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
LOS ANGELES (Reuters) - “Avengers: Infinity War” took in $39 million (£28.29 million) on Thursday evening at U.S. and Canadian box offices, the fourth-biggest opening night of all time, distributor Walt Disney Co said. Actor Robert Downey Jr. poses with fans. REUTERS/Mario Anzuoni
It is the highest-grossing opening for any movie from Disney’s Marvel Studios, the producer of a string of blockbuster superhero films. Reporting by Lisa Richwine
